name: Rhythm Knights (itch)
description:
An unfinished prototype entry for MiniJam 125 -- Signal
I don't intend to enter it as an official entry, just because I don't feel that I sufficiently fleshed out the concept in the way I wanted to.

All of the graphics and programming was done by me in <72 hours in Godot. Sounds were made by me with the help of Audacity and sfxr.

The game only features a very simple combat encounter, but the original concept was for much more, as well as a level-up system.
